verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name: <S%H8034><s%> make known <S%H3045><s%> his deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the people. <S%H5971><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him, sing psalms <S%H2167><s%> unto him: talk <S%H7878><s%> ye of all <S%H3605><s%> his wondrous works. <S%H6381><s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name: <S%H8034><s%> let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his strength: <S%H5797><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> evermore. <S%H8548><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvelous works <S%H6381><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath done; <S%H6213><s%> his wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth; <S%H6310><s%>
O ye seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his chosen. <S%H972><s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God: <S%H430><s%> his judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> covenant he made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and his oath <S%H7621><s%> unto Isaac; <S%H3446><s%>
And confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a law, <S%H2706><s%> and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant: <S%H1285><s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>
When they were <S%H1961><s%> but a few men <S%H4962><s%> in number; <S%H4557><s%> yea, very few, <S%H4592><s%> and strangers <S%H1481><s%> in it.

When they went <S%H1980><s%> from one nation <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1471><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H1471><s%> from one kingdom <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4467><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another <S%H312><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%>
He suffered <S%H5117><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> to do them wrong: <S%H6231><s%> yea, he reproved <S%H3198><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> for their sakes; <S%H5921><s%>
Saying, Touch <S%H5060><s%> not <S%H408><s%> mine anointed, <S%H4899><s%> and do my prophets <S%H5030><s%> no <S%H408><s%> harm. <S%H7489><s%>
Moreover he called for <S%H7121><s%> a famine <S%H7458><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> he broke <S%H7665><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread. <S%H3899><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, even Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> who was sold <S%H4376><s%> for a servant: <S%H5650><s%>
Whose feet <S%H7272><s%> they hurt <S%H6031><s%> with fetters: <S%H3525><s%> he <S%H5315><s%> was laid <S%H935><s%> in iron: <S%H1270><s%>
Until <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> that his word <S%H1697><s%> came: <S%H935><s%> the word <S%H565><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> tried <S%H6884><s%> him.
The king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and loosed <S%H5425><s%> him; even the ruler <S%H4910><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and let him go free. <S%H6605><s%>
He made <S%H7760><s%> him lord <S%H113><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> and ruler <S%H4910><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his substance: <S%H7075><s%>
To bind <S%H631><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> at his pleasure; <S%H5315><s%> and teach his senators <S%H2205><s%> wisdom. <S%H2449><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came into <S%H935><s%> Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
And he increased <S%H6509><s%> <S%H853><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and made them stronger <S%H6105><s%> than their enemies. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6862><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to deal subtlely <S%H5230><s%> with his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant; <S%H5650><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had chosen. <S%H977><s%>
They showed <S%H7760><s%> his signs <S%H1697><s%> <S%H226><s%> among them, and wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and made it dark; <S%H2821><s%> and they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> against <S%H853><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H853><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> into blood, <S%H1818><s%> and slew <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> their fish. <S%H1710><s%>
Their land <S%H776><s%> brought forth frogs in abundance, <S%H8317><s%> <S%H6854><s%> in the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of their kings. <S%H4428><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and there came <S%H935><s%> divers sorts of flies, <S%H6157><s%> and lice <S%H3654><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their coasts. <S%H1366><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them hail <S%H1259><s%> for rain, <S%H1653><s%> and flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in their land. <S%H776><s%>
He smote <S%H5221><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> also and their fig trees; <S%H8384><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of their coasts. <S%H1366><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and the locusts <S%H697><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and caterpillars, <S%H3218><s%> and that without <S%H369><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%>
And did eat up <S%H398><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the herbs <S%H6212><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> and devoured <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their ground. <S%H127><s%>
He smote <S%H5221><s%> also all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> the chief <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their strength. <S%H202><s%>
He brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> also with silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold: <S%H2091><s%> and there was not <S%H369><s%> one feeble <S%H3782><s%> person among their tribes. <S%H7626><s%>
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they departed: <S%H3318><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of them fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them.
He spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> for a covering; <S%H4539><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
The people asked, <S%H7592><s%> and he brought <S%H935><s%> quails, <S%H7958><s%> and satisfied <S%H7646><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
He opened <S%H6605><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed out; <S%H2100><s%> they ran <S%H1980><s%> in the dry places <S%H6723><s%> like a river. <S%H5104><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> promise, <S%H1697><s%> and <S%H853><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant. <S%H5650><s%>
And he brought forth <S%H3318><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with joy, <S%H8342><s%> and <S%H853><s%> his chosen <S%H972><s%> with gladness: <S%H7440><s%>
And gave <S%H5414><s%> them the lands <S%H776><s%> of the heathen: <S%H1471><s%> and they inherited <S%H3423><s%> the labor <S%H5999><s%> of the people; <S%H3816><s%>
That <S%H5668><s%> they might observe <S%H8104><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and keep <S%H5341><s%> his laws. <S%H8451><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
